Question: Wat is ${`r a`} + {`r b`}$ ?
r-code:
```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
## parameters
a <- sample(1:10, 1) # take from 2 to 10, only 1 number 
b <- sample(seq(2, 4, 0.1), 1)
## solution
res <- a + b
```
